gnospediatheme-desc: Custom theme and enhancements for GnosPedia wiki farm
gnospediatheme-create-wiki-subtitle: Join thousands of communities and create a wiki about your passion
gnospediatheme-wiki-name-help: This will be displayed as your wiki's title
gnospediatheme-wiki-address-help: Your wiki will be available at this address
gnospediatheme-wiki-description-placehol: Tell us what your wiki will be about...
gnospediatheme-success-message: Your wiki '$1' has been created and is ready to use.
gnospediatheme-error-required: All required fields must be filled.
gnospediatheme-error-exists: A wiki with this address already exists.
gnospediatheme-error-failed: Failed to create wiki. Please try again.
gnospediatheme-category-entertainment-de: Create wikis about movies, TV shows, actors, and entertainment
gnospediatheme-category-gaming-desc: Build communities around video games, characters, and strategies
gnospediatheme-category-literature-desc: Share knowledge about books, authors, and literary works
gnospediatheme-category-technology-desc: Document tech projects, programming, and innovations
gnospediatheme-category-lifestyle-desc: Cover fashion, food, travel, and lifestyle topics
gnospediatheme-category-education-desc: Create educational resources and academic content
gnospediatheme-category-sports-desc: Cover sports teams, players, and competitions
